metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6816 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ganglia-web before 3.7.1 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-6816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganglia-webfrontend - 3.7.5+debian-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> web interface moved out of ganglia and into ganglia-web in 3.6.0-1

criterions.comment: ganglia-web package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.5+debian-1').
